document_data.name: Ivor Chernin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ivor "the Grinder" Chernin''' was a Vindicator of the [[Warlock Knights]] of [[Vaasa]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|77}}
document_data.Description:
{{Quote|By the Will of the Voice, the soul of Vaasa belongs to Telos, and through his might the Warlock Knights cannot fall.|Ivor Chernin}}
As a Knight-Vindicator of the Warlock Knights, Lord Chernin was a powerful member of the feudal elite, and had lesser lords ("Fellthanes") swearing their allegiance to him.{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|78}} He was dedicated to the [[Voice of Telos]] and venerated the [[primordial]] [[Telos]].
document_data.Personality:
{{Quote|They may send legions in the thousands to stop us, but they will fail. They may send [[paladin]]s by the score to smite us, but they too will fail.|Ivor Chernin}}
Ivor presented himself as a bold and cruel military commander unafraid to embrace his [[evil]] side.
document_data.Abilities: As a Knight-Vindicator, "the Grinder" was adept with both weapons and arcane magic, had access to ''[[ironfell]]'' equipment, and could channel the radiant powers of Telos.
